title.narrative: Programme level monitoring & evaluation of Education Technical Assistance to General Quality Improvement Program for Equity in Ethiopia

description.narrative: Montrose provides M&E Support to TARGET. This includes advice, support and quality assurance to enrich TARGET's own M&E activities and support to TARGET to make decisions based on systematically collected data. Montrose will provide independent verification of TARGET's activities and milestones. Montrose will also provide lessons learned on what works in terms of TA in Ethiopia and education TA in general.

recipient-country.narrative: Scope of work: Montrose will need to provide both accountability to FCDO in terms of TARGET's performance and provide support, learning and recommendations directly to TARGET itself. Montrose will assess TARGET's progress against the broader theory of change and relevant GEQUIP-E logframe output areas
